content: haymarket bag by julie schramm jujluiliee rroommaannoo eetthhrirdigdege materials fantasy naturalle mercerized cotton yarn 3 skeins crochet hook size h splint ring marker button leather purse strap with ring gauge 4hdc = 1 abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet-double_crochet half_double_crochet-half_double_crochet slip_stitch-stitch increase-increase decrease-decrease **this pattern uses a 5dc bobble stitch to make a bobble yo insert hook in next st as specified by pattern instructions pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook yarn over insert hook in same stitch draw up a loop yarn over draw through 2 loops 4 times yarn over draw through last 6 loops on hook chain 1 to complete the stitch directions bottom chain 3 join with slip_stitch to form circle 12 single_crochet in center of circle 1 ch2 counts as half_double_crochet throughout half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 12st 2 ch2 2hdc in next st increase made and each stitch around join with slip_stitch 24st 3 ch2 increase half_double_crochet increase around join with slip_stitch 36 4 ch2 half_double_crochet increase 2hdc increase around join with slip_stitch 48 5 ch2 half_double_crochet around 48 6 ch2 2hdc increase 3hdc increase around join with slip_stitch 60 7 ch2 3hdc increase 4hdc increase around join with slip_stitch 72 8 ch2 4hdc increase 5hdc increase around join with slip_stitch 84 9 ch2 half_double_crochet around 84 10 ch2 5hdc increase 6hdc increase around join with slip_stitch 96 body 1 ch1 single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 96 2 chain 1 single_crochet in back loop around join with slip_stitch 3 chain 1 single_crochet around do not join at end of round 4-14 single_crochet place marker in first stitch of round to mark beginning single_crochet around remember to replace marker in first stitch of each round join with slip_stitch at end of 14th round 15-17 chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 18 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet bobble in next st 3dc bobble around join with slip_stitch 19-21 chain 2 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 96 sts 22 ch1 single_crochet in same st place marker in this single_crochet single_crochet around 23-32 single_crochet around being sure to replace marker at beginning of each round 33 5sc decrease around 84 34 single_crochet around 35 4sc decrease around 70 36 16 single_crochet decrease chain 14 slip_stitch in 1st chain button loop formed single_crochet 34 decrease single_crochet to end join with slip_stitch and bind off tabs for straps join yarn in 34th st from button loop chain 1 single_crochet in same st and next 3 sts turn and repeat between ** for 2 inches bind off repeat on the other side of bag thread through the loop on end of strap and sew to bag as shown sew button to front center © 2007 jjuulliiee e sthcrhidragmem
